needsAttention.title: 2024 Tax Return
needsAttention.details: Estimated liability ~$9,200 + ~$3,100 penalties = ~$12,343. True 2024 gross: $67,666. CPA candidates: Dimov Tax (866-681-2140), Mary Geong (510-654-4417), Chang & Associates (510-548-1962). Howard has corrected income reconciliation ready. Next step: decide on CPA vs DIY prep.

needsAttention.title: Insurance Broker Response
needsAttention.details: Henry Medina (Novamar Insurance Group) confirmed 2/12/2026: USL&H endorsement IS required for in-water dive service. Standard CA state WC is NOT sufficient. To add W-2 employee to GL policy, broker needs: employee name+DOB, new gross receipts estimate, estimated payroll. RLI GL does NOT cover employee liability. Contact: Henry Medina (619) 226-8661, Henry@novamar.net. Katrina Kashishian also at Novamar now (moved from Mariners General).

needsAttention.title: 1120-S Filing
needsAttention.details: S-Corp tax filing for SailorSkills LLC. Need to reconcile 2025 income/expenses, confirm officer compensation (reasonable salary test), and file by March 15 or request extension. Howard can help prep the financial summary.

needsAttention.title: Gmail OAuth
needsAttention.details: Gmail OAuth token expired. Need to re-authenticate through Google Cloud Console to restore Howard's email access. This blocks email checking, sending, and inbox monitoring. Quick fix ‚Äî just need to go through the OAuth flow again.

needsAttention.title: USCG Vessel Documentation Expired
needsAttention.detail: Maris COD lapsed ~9.5 months ‚Äî renew/reinstate ASAP
needsAttention.details: Coast Guard Certificate of Documentation for Maris (Official #1149206) expired 4/30/2025. Requires reinstatement (not just renewal) since >30 days lapsed. Cost: $26 + $5 late fee = $31. Renew online at uscg.mil/nvdc or call (800) 799-8362. Expired COD may affect insurance coverage (check RLI policy requirements). Address on file: 201 University Ave, Slip O-699.

timeAllocation.label: SailorSkills Pro Dev
timeAllocation.details: Jacques building Pro app (TestFlight Build 18). Recent: voice data transform, auto-calculated billing, anode management. 17 days to March 1 launch.

timeAllocation.label: Hull Cleaning (diving)
timeAllocation.details: Active hull cleaning operations in Oakland/Berkeley marina. Regular clients: Scott Cyphers, Dennis Zinn. Revenue stream while building Pro app.

timeAllocation.label: Business / Planning
timeAllocation.details: Sarah's hiring/term sheet analysis, revenue modeling, insurance research, strategic planning for SailorSkills expansion. Mariners General WC quote pending.

timeAllocation.label: Taxes / Finance
timeAllocation.details: 2024 tax return overdue (~$12,343 estimated). 1120-S due March 15. Need to find CPA or prepare DIY. Income reconciliation done.

timeAllocation.label: Infrastructure / Tools
timeAllocation.details: Cost optimization: 4 model providers configured (Opus/DeepSeek/Kimi/Gemini). Heartbeats off, local embeddings. Email infra (Resend Pro). Dashboard. 6 Cowork skills ported. TOS escape hatch in progress.

timeAllocation.label: Personal
timeAllocation.details: Car maintenance (smog check needed), TMC group coordination, personal errands. Keeping it minimal during sprint push.

recentActivity.text: Gemini 2.5 Flash configured as image fallback for all models
recentActivity.details: Set imageModel.primary to google/gemini-2.5-flash-preview. Screenshots now work on DeepSeek and Kimi (text-only models) by auto-routing to Gemini for vision analysis. Free tier.

recentActivity.text: Multi-model setup complete: Opus + DeepSeek + Kimi + Gemini
recentActivity.details: Configured 4 model providers. /model opus ($5/$25 MTok), /model deepseek ($0.28/$0.42), /model kimi (free), plus Gemini Flash for images. Target: $50-150/month vs $1,600. Aliases configured for easy switching.

Switched memory search from OpenAI API to local node-llama-cpp with Metal GPU acceleration. Disabled heartbeats (were 21% of API calls, ~$113/mo wasted with empty HEARTBEAT.md). Combined savings: ~$150/month.

recentActivity.text: 6 Anthropic Cowork plugins ported to OpenClaw skills
recentActivity.details: Ported product-management, finance, legal, customer-support, sales, marketing skills from Anthropic's open-source Cowork plugins. 2,140 lines total. All passing validation.

recentActivity.text: Insurance broker confirmed USL&H required for dive work
recentActivity.details: Henry Medina at Novamar confirmed that in-water dive service requires WC policy with USL&H endorsement, not standard state WC. Estimated cost ~$3,500-4,800/yr for $36K-48K payroll. Also confirmed RLI GL does not cover employee liability. Katrina moved from Mariners General to Novamar.

recentActivity.text: Bullet journal to-dos integrated into tracking
recentActivity.details: Digitized bullet journal to-do items into dashboard tracking system. Categories: Business, Personal, TMC. Now trackable and checkable from the web dashboard.

recentActivity.text: Sarah postponed diving venture ‚Äî door left open
recentActivity.details: Sarah decided to postpone the diving venture for personal reasons. The door is left open for future collaboration. Term sheet and revenue model work preserved for when she's ready.
Static dashboard deployed via Vercel with auto-deploy from GitHub. Catppuccin Mocha theme, Chart.js donut, password-gated. Data-driven via data.json.

recentActivity.text: Insurance email sent to Mariners General
recentActivity.details: Sent inquiry about workers compensation classification type for hull cleaning operations. Need to know WC type for insurance planning regardless of Sarah's decision.
Set up Obsidian vault with Dataview and Charts plugins. Created initial dashboard views for project tracking. Decided to also build a web version for mobile access.
Added Section 16 to Sarah's term sheet: per-boat economics at 50% and 45%, monthly projections, strategic considerations for each rate.
Set up Resend Pro for transactional email. Verified briancline.co domain with DNS records. Two of three domains now verified.
Started domain transfer for needsarenormal.com. Waiting for transfer to complete before DNS verification for email sending.
Installed Dataview and Charts community plugins in Obsidian. Configured for project tracking queries and visual progress charts.

recentActivity.text: Email to broker re: WC type
recentActivity.details: Follow-up email to insurance broker about workers compensation classification type for marine hull cleaning services.
Submitted TestFlight Build 14 for SailorSkills Pro. Includes latest UI improvements and bug fixes from Week 3 sprint.
Built comprehensive revenue model for Sarah's diving venture: per-boat economics, monthly projections at different rates, break-even analysis.

recentActivity.details: Onboarded two new hull cleaning customers. Set up in system with boat details, scheduling preferences, and billing information.
